description: half length portrait of a heavy set man in an oval frame facing front and looking right; collar length hair; wearing soft cap and fringed white neckcloth; holding a cup(?) in his left hand
inscription:
Title, and Inscription

around top of oval in brown: Multo imprimis hilarans convivia Baccho. Virgil 5 eclog. | below image in brown: JOHANN DIETZEN; / nobilis Peregrinantium Hospes; natus Skeititziae, guae in Misnia / (?): Schenk fec. et exc. Amistelod  Cum Privil : Ordin: Holl et West-Frisiae  | on sheet in pencil: 2-375
title: Portrait of Johann Dietzen
